long_description: The bold Smith Frontman sunglasses put you front and center with charisma and crisp, fresh details. A curved design and thick temples block out the sun (or camera flashes from your adoring fans). Polycarbonate lenses reduce glare and feature 100% UV protection. Matte Graphite frames feature gray-tint lenses, ideal for bright days and direct sunlight. Black Olive frames feature brown-tint lenses that enhance your vision in a wide range of light and weather conditions. Hydrophilic Megol nosepiece and temple ends become tackier when wet for reliable grip during exercise and hot weather. 53% bio-based Evolve frames are made with Rilsan(R) Clear, a light, durable, non-petroleum-based material derived from renewable, non-GMO castor plants.
short_description: The bold Smith Frontman sunglasses put you front and center with charisma and crisp, fresh details. A curved design and thick temples block out the sun (or camera flashes from your adoring fans).
